getData 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Efficient extraction of spatial-temporal series over small-scale areas

Get data sources / collections implemented in the package

Source: R/getAvailableDataSources.R
getAvailableDataSources.Rd

This function returns a table of the data sources / collections that can be downloaded and pre-processed using the getData package

getAvailableDataSources()

Value

a data.frame with the data sources / collections dealt by getData, along with details on each data collection

Details

The output data.frame columns are:

  • "source": The source acronym

  • "collection": The collection

  • "...": ...TODO : finish description

Examples


sources<-getAvailableDataSources()
sources
#>                                          Covariate                   Source
